name: Chezmoi
description: Manage your dotfiles across multiple diverse machines, securely.

dotfiles_repo.description: Use this dotfiles repo to initialize

one_shot.description: use `--one-shot` during init process. It is the equivalent of `--apply`, `--depth=1`, `--force`, `--purge`, and `--purge-binary`. It attempts to install your dotfiles with chezmoi and then remove all traces of chezmoi from the system. This is useful for setting up temporary environments (e.g. Docker containers).
